TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit AssociatedControlConverter extends System.Web.UI.WebControls.ControlIDConverter

Docs.summary: Provides a type converter that retrieves a list of controls in the current container.

remarks.format:
## Remarks The AssociatedControlConverter class derives from the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ControlIDConverter> class and provides a type converter specifically for controls that derive from the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl> class. It is used by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Label.AssociatedControlID%2A> property of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Label> control.
For more information about type converters, see [How to: Implement a Type Converter](../Topic/How%20to:%20Implement%20a%20Type%20Converter.md) or [Generalized Type Conversion](../Topic/Generalized%20Type%20Conversion.md).

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor() cil managed

Docs.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks **Note** You should never access a type converter directly. Instead, call the appropriate converter by using a <xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeDescriptor> object. For more information, see the examples in <xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeConverter>.

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig virtual instance bool FilterControl(class System.Web.UI.Control control) cil managed
